event.title: Becoming a Full Time Open Source Maintainer
event.metaTitle: Becoming a Full Time Open Source Maintainer
event.metaDesc: Join us for on Twitter Spaces to learn about becoming a full time open source maintainer.
event.content: For Open Source Friday (June 3rd at 3pm ET), Rizel Scarlett is chatting with Josh Goldberg about his journey to becoming a full time open source maintainer! Join us on Twitter Spaces at this link https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1MYxNnPNqmbxw!
